content:
The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces General-General Alexander Sirsky showed vivid episodes of destruction of enemy equipment and weapons. As a result, the enemy suffered serious losses.

Frames Commander -in -Chief of the Armed ForcesPublicatedIn telegrams.

"Neither day nor at night our warriors give the enemy a break and disrupt the occupiers' plans," - saidCommander -in -Chief of the Armed Forces of UkraineColonel-General Alexander Sirsky.

As reportedArmyinform, last day, the enemy minus almost 1000 invaders, 44 artsystems and 28 BBM.

Previously, the Commander -in -Chief of the Armed Forcesreportedthat some troops will be reformatted.
title: The Commander -in -Chief of the Armed Forces showed footage of destruction of enemy equipment and weapons
description: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces was published in a telegram-channel. “No day or night ...
author: Army Inform
